bench-press.name: Bench Press
instructions: Lie on bench with feet flat on ground
Lower weight to chest level with control
Press weight up until arms are extended
Keep shoulders back and stable throughout

push-ups.name: Push-Ups
instructions: Start in plank position with hands shoulder-width apart
Lower body until chest nearly touches ground
Push body back up to starting position
Keep core tight and body straight throughout

incline-dumbbell-press.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Lie on incline bench set to 30-45 degrees
Press dumbbells up with controlled motion
Lower weights until slight chest stretch

cable-flyes.name: Cable Flyes
instructions: Stand between cable machines, arms extended
Slight bend in elbows throughout movement
Bring handles together in hugging motion
Control weight back with chest stretch
